title: Yankee to Yandere no Karera ni wa Tomodachi ga Inai
original_name: ヤンキーとヤンデレの彼らには友だちがいない
sinopse:
One is a delinquent-looking pervert, the other is a haraguro yandere. Place them together. This is their daily comedy school life.

(Source: Batoto)

Included one-shot:
Volume 1: Yamada to Yamada to
